title: LF D3+ Players for Ranked 5v5s
body:
Hey,
I am Looking for Diamond 3+ players for a Ranked 5v5 team. Requirements listed below.

-Must be at least 18 years of age.
-A working mic and Teamspeak 3
-The ability to play in a team environment
-Open to feedback
-Not a rager and committed to improving as a team
-Can dedicate at least 3 days a week for team practice 

If you are interested, feel free to add me in game. 'Xarigizel'
